ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: System optimization and cleanup for macOS users via a command-line interface.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ All-in-one toolkit (CleanMyMac + AppCleaner + DaisyDisk + Sensei + iStat) â€¢ Deep system cleanup (caches, temp files, browser leftovers, junk) â€¢ Smart application uninstallation (app bundles, launch agents, settings, caches, logs, leftovers) â€¢ Disk insight and optimization (large files, folder display, cache rebuild, swap clean, service refresh)
ðŸ“– Summary: Mole is a command-line utility for macOS designed to deeply clean and optimize your system. It acts as an all-in-one tool, consolidating features found in popular applications like CleanMyMac, AppCleaner, and DaisyDisk, to free up disk space, uninstall applications with their leftovers, and monitor system health.
